name: Zip-Line Combo Tour
description:
The Zip-Line Combo Tour takes you along the beautiful coast of the Bay of Banderas and up to a Zip-Line canopy tour in the heart of the Sierra Madre for a day full of adrenaline.

The tour begins by safely driving your own ATV through the wonderful preserved colonial town of Puerto Vallarta.  Next, out of town your journey will take you past the lush covered Sierra Madre mountain range where you’ll smell the fresh ocean breeze in the open air and see the vistas of the open Pacific Coastline.
